member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnSampleCallback2.OnSynchronizedEvent
member.summary: Called by the capture sink when the format of the sample is changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnSampleCallback2
member.summary: Extensions for the callback interface that is used to receive data from the capture engine.
